doubleBonusTenSeven

Class DoubleBonusTenSeven

  • java.lang.Object

    GUI

    public class DoubleBonusTenSeven
extends DoubleBonus
    Class DoubleBonusTenSeven, class that extends the class DoubleBonus. Class in which the different modes are defined, the Reward Table is filled and the advice cards are also defined.
